ProductInfo.Features:
8 CH H.264 compression triplex real time industrial DVR, 1500GB SATA hard drive included. 8 channel video and 4 channel audio inputs
Two USB interface, one for data backup, one for mouse operation
Support the live video, parameter setting and copy playback video via network. Support iPhone Google Phone
Support daylight saving time, PIP and EZOOM function. CIF: 200fps/8ch
Package includes: 1 x 8ch DVR, 4 x dome cameras, 4 x bullet cameras, 8 x 12V DC power supplies, 8 x video power cables and free security warning stickers
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 8-Channel CCTV Digital Video Recorder 1500GB Hard Drive Surveillance DVR System with 8 Outdoor Color IR Cameras, Power Supplies and Extension Cables 1VQ
